questions.question: This is something or someone who prduces a result.
This is a change that occurs when something happens
There is a direct realtionshp between cause and effect.
What is the effect to the following cause: I stayed up late playing video games.

choices.answer: I had a hard time sleeping.
I was on point the next day in school.
I was able to talk to my friends about the video game.
I was tired in school and couldn't concentrate.

questions.question: What is the best cause for the following effect: I was exhausted and my muscles were sore.

choices.answer: I spent a long amount of time working at the computer.
I completed an hour long work out consisting of running, lunges, and crunch
I watched a movie marathon with my friends over the weekend.
I ate a lot of pie after dinner.

questions.question: When identifying cause and effect,  cause will always come first in a text.

choices.answer: Words that tell you there is a cause and effect relationship.
Words that tell you a different narrator is speaking.
Words that signal a change in time peridod.
Signal words are the same as transition words.

questions.question: Which example below does NOT include signal words.

choices.answer: If I study hard, then I will be a better student.
Since I made it on the basketball team, I have no time to be with my family
My dog ran away because I forgot to put him on the leash.
I ate earlier. I am not hungry.

questions.question: Hieroglyphs were difficult to decipher because they were considered a dead language.
What is the correct order of when the languages were created?
